biotools.summary: The IMAAAGINE server is a protein structural motif database searching program. Users can define an amino acid arrangment of 3 to 8 residues which will be converted into a search pattern. The search using the query is carried out against the PDB. 3D arrangements of amino acids in PDB structures that conform to the query will be returned to the user.
